summary: Marketing and Communications Director with a track record of developing strategic communications plans, managing large budgets, and increasing audience engagement across state-wide campaigns.

experience.title: Marketing and Communications Director
experience.description: Developed and executed a robust marketing and communications strategy; created compelling content; conducted market research to inform outreach; strengthened brand and messaging for policy and electoral campaigns across Washington; collaborated with executives and national cohorts; managed budgets and engaged stakeholders.

experience.title: Associate Director of Corporate Relations
experience.description: Led all communications activities including marketing, public relations, and social media; pitched stories to journalists; managed executive media profiles; developed speaking plans; created branding materials and messaging; served as a creative copywriter for pitches, brochures, and web promotions; planned cross-channel presence across traditional and digital media.

experience.title: New York Director for Management and Planning
experience.description: Led establishment of the New York Office; oversaw a $10 million operating budget; secured grants; developed evaluation tools; drafted speeches and policy documents; ensured international compliance; managed internal and external communications for the office.

experience.title: Governance Manager
experience.description: Organized governance activities; liaised with the Board of Directors; edited grant proposals; tracked board priorities; represented the CEO in internal and external settings.

education.school: Annenberg School of Communications, University of Pennsylvania
Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University

certifications: Marketing/Leadership Executive Program certificate, Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University, 2007
